issue.title: Splitwise Clone - Expense Sharing App
issue.body:
## Overview
Build a web app where friends can track shared expenses and settle debts. Think Splitwise but simpler.

## Core Features

### Authentication
- Email/password signup and login
- Protected routes - must be logged in to use the app

### Groups
- Create groups for different occasions (roommates, trips, dinners)
- Invite friends to groups by email
- See all your groups on a dashboard

### Expenses  
- Add expenses to a group (who paid, how much, what for)
- Split expenses equally among group members
- View expense history in a group

### Balances
- See who owes whom in each group
- Simplified debts (minimize number of transactions needed)
- Mark debts as settled

## Tech Stack
- **Frontend**: Next.js 14 with App Router, Tailwind CSS
- **Backend**: Next.js API routes
- **Database**: SQLite with better-sqlite3
- **Auth**: JWT tokens with jose, passwords hashed with bcryptjs

## Pages
- Landing page
- Login / Signup
- Dashboard (list of groups)
- Group detail (expenses, balances, members)
- Add expense form
- Create group form

## Quality
- Clean, modern UI
- Mobile responsive
- TypeScript throughout
- Proper error handling

ems.task: Initialize Next.js 14 project with App Router, configure TypeScript (tsconfig.json), set up package.json with all dependencies (next, react, better-sqlite3, jose, bcryptjs, tailwindcss), create .gitignore, and configure Tailwind CSS

analysisSummary: Implement a Splitwise-style expense sharing app with Next.js 14, featuring JWT authentication, group management, expense tracking with equal splitting, and simplified debt calculation using SQLite and better-sqlite3.

pendingEMs.task: Implement authentication system (signup/login API routes in app/api/auth/, JWT utilities with jose, password hashing with bcryptjs) and database layer (SQLite schema with better-sqlite3 in lib/db/, user and group models)

Build group management features (create group API, invite members, group listing) and expense tracking (add expense API, expense history, equal splitting logic, debt calculation/simplification algorithm)

Create all UI components and pages (landing page in app/page.tsx, login/signup in app/auth/, dashboard in app/dashboard/, group detail in app/group/[id]/, add expense and create group forms) with Tailwind CSS styling and mobile responsiveness
